Articles.Content:
Aw yeah?

that bunker cant sustain a nuke!

Now its a war against birds

>

Broken image.

anyway, in respone to the last one, wait.

you posted two posts, you have to wait for someone to post after you, to post again.

but, to counter this:

> 
> ![hippies.jpg](http://tucsoncitizen.com/retroflections/files/2010/01/hippies.jpg)

![gun1.jpg](http://glenngohr.files.wordpress.com/2008/07/gun1.jpg)

> anyway, in respone to the last one, wait.

> you posted two posts, you have to wait for someone to post after you, to post again.
> 
> but, to counter this:![gun1.jpg](http://glenngohr.files.wordpress.com/2008/07/gun1.jpg)

The broken image is just a crude snapshot of the intro to the movie Watchmen. The scene is the flower power thing, and the military police shot them. MUAHAHA 8) (Joking)

here, I found a real life version.

![Flower_Power_demonstrator.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/4e/Flower_Power_demonstrator.jpg)

You offer me a flower?

Take it back...

![7ff370c7d6e3a8a67eb5131f282454d1.jpg](http://www.writerscafe.org/uploads/rte/7ff370c7d6e3a8a67eb5131f282454d1.jpg)

Burning, of course.

Since most fire extinguishers are CO^2^ based, time to use photosynthesis 8)

> ![Snake_plant.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/91/Snake_plant.jpg)
I need a picture hosting site that hosts pictures larger than 2.0mb.

I counter with a banhammer.

![BanHammer.gif](http://krapps.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/11/BanHammer.gif)

It happens to people that stray off-topic and start rambling about their fanboyism.

> 
> I counter with a banhammer.
> 
> ![BanHammer.gif](http://krapps.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/11/BanHammer.gif)
> 
> It happens to people that stray off-topic and start rambling about their fanboyism.

I... It wasn\'t me that started it!

Anyway, I destroy your banhammer with an angle grinder.

> ![Mr-Skill-Makita-Angle-Grinder.jpg](http://www.parkinplanttoolhire.com/images/Mr-Skill-Makita-Angle-Grinder.jpg)
